  }

/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64, */</style><style>.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: var(--space-2);
  font-weight: 600;
  border-radius: var(--theme-border-radius);
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--transition-fast);
  font-family: var(--theme-font);
  text-decoration: none;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.btn:focus {
  outline: 2px solid var(--theme-button, var(--theme-primary));
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* Sizes */
.btn-sm {
  padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-3);
  font-size: 0.875rem;
  line-height: 1.25rem;
}

.btn-md {
  padding: var(--space-3) var(--space-5);
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.5rem;
}

.btn-lg {
  padding: var(--space-4) var(--space-6);
  font-size: 1.125rem;
  line-height: 1.75rem;
}

/* Variants */
.btn-primary {
  background: var(--theme-button, var(--theme-button-primary));
  color: white;
  box-shadow: var(--theme-button-shadow);
}

.btn-primary:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: var(--theme-hover);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: var(--theme-card-shadow-hover);
}

.btn-primary:active:not(:disabled) {
  transform: translateY(0);
}

.btn-secondary {
  background: var(--theme-secondary, var(--theme-button-secondary));
  color: white;
  box-shadow: var(--theme-button-shadow);
}

.btn-secondary:hover:not(:disabled) {
  opacity: 0.9;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: var(--theme-card-shadow-hover);
}

.btn-outline {
  background: transparent;
  border: 2px solid var(--theme-button, var(--theme-primary));
  color: var(--theme-button, var(--theme-primary));
}

.btn-outline:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: var(--theme-background-low, var(--theme-bg-lowest));
  border-color: var(--theme-hover);
  color: var(--theme-hover);
}

.btn-ghost {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--gray-700);
}

.btn-ghost:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: var(--gray-100);
}

.btn-danger {
  background: var(--error-500);
  color: white;
}

  background: var(--error-600);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64, */</style><style>@import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700&family=Manrope:wght@400;600;700&family=Nunito:wght@400;600;700&display=swap);</style><style>/* GLOBAL DESIGN SYSTEM - Real Estate App */

/* Import Google Fonts */

:root {
  /* Theme Variables - Dynamically set by ThemeContext */
  /* New naming convention */
  --theme-primary: #1D4ED8;
  --theme-secondary: #0EA5E9;
  --theme-background-low: #F8FAFC;
  --theme-background-high: #FFFFFF;
  --theme-button: #1D4ED8;
  --theme-icon: #1E3A8A;
  --theme-hover: #2563EB;
  
  /* Legacy support - old naming convention */
  --theme-bg-lowest: #F8FAFC;
  --theme-bg-higher: #FFFFFF;
  --theme-button-primary: #1D4ED8;
  --theme-button-secondary: #0EA5E9;
  --theme-text: #1E293B;
